review_title: Very good work environment, chill place to work. Quite dedicated Senior Management
pros:
Awesome Work Environment.
The cause is worthwhile all your efforts and hard work. They motivate you to grow, especially if you are a beginner. The low rate of employee turnover indicates how employees feel loyal to the organization. Being an NGO they are quite considerate towards their employees.
cons: Salary compared to other international organizations is a bit low. Perks are also minimal.

pros: Let me think... absolutely absolutely none
cons:
1. No HR, random employees consider themselves HR
2. Unprofessionalism, no passion
3. Very low payscale
4. No meetings, no work schedule 
5. No promotion even after two years
6. No work ethics
7. Horrible communication
